## Objectives

General 

:::{.fragment .highlight-current-blue}
- Evaluate the spatial-temporal dynamics of *Microcystis spp.* blooms on Cassino beach.
:::

Specifics

:::{.fragment .highlight-current-blue}
- Study the bio-optical properties of the pigments chlorophyll-a and phycocyanins present in cyanobacterial blooms.
:::

:::{.fragment .highlight-current-blue}
- Determine Cassino beach bating suitability by using satellite images to monitor the origin and movements of *Microcystis* blooms.
:::

:::{.fragment .highlight-current-blue}
- Quantify cyanobacterial pigments in continental and oceanic waters and correlate them with cell numbers.
:::
